channel.title: Visiting Students on NTU IoT Sensing Group
channel.description: Recent content in Visiting Students on NTU IoT Sensing Group

item.title: Huimin Chen
item.description: Position: Visting Student Contact: N2207910A@e.ntu.edu.sg Bio: I am currently a Ph.D. student at the college of control science and engineering, Zhejiang University. I received my B.Eng. degree from Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics in 2018. Now I am a visiting student at NTU under Prof. Tan Rui, and my research interest lies in acoustic sensing. Research projects: Acoustic and imagery sensing

item.title: Lilin Xu
item.description: Position: Visting Student Contact: lilinxu@zju.edu.cn Bio: I am currently a master student at the college of control science and engineering, Zhejiang University. Now I am a visiting student at NTU under Prof. Tan Rui, and my research interest lies in acoustic sensing. Research projects: AIoT and mobile sensing
